title: Join us today!
posting_body: ['To schedule a tour', 'We now book our tour appointments online!', 'Please call or text us at', 'show contact info', 'to self-schedule from your phone!', 'Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!', 'Property Description', 'These recently upgraded Atwater apartments couple modern interiors with calming lake views and fresh air.', 'Atwater includes two resort-style pools, a fitness center, four lit tennis courts, barbecues with picnic areas, and privacy gates.', 'Inside, find gourmet kitchens, brilliant cabinetry, gorgeous countertops, and in-home washers and dryers.', 'Water Terrace is perfectly located near the major freeways, great shopping, airport, amazing restaurants, and recreation.', 'Details', 'Availability date:', 'Today', 'Pets:', 'Cats, Small Dogs (< 25lb), Large Dogs (> 25lb)', 'Pet notes:', 'Dogs and Cats Allowed: We accept 2 pets per apartment home.', 'There is a $350 fee per cat and $500 fee per dog.', 'A $30 pet rent per pet will be applied to your monthly rent.', 'Please see a Leasing Associate to learn more about weight and breed restrictions.•$30 Monthly Pet Rent•$350 - 500 Fee•2 Pet Limit', 'Deposit:', 'Leasing options:', '12 months', 'Leasing notes:', 'Application fees: $100 for each adult 18+Administration fees: $300 per householdSecurity deposits on approved credit: A1 $400, A2 $500, B1 & B2 $700', 'Application fee:', '100.00', 'Amenities', 'Included in Utilities Cost:', 'Utilities Cost:', 'None', 'Laundry:', 'In Unit', 'Parking type:', 'Parking notes:', 'None', 'Appliances:', 'Dishwasher, Refrigerator, Garbage disposal, Microwave, Range/Oven', 'Exterior:', 'Balcony/patio, Lake, Sprinkler system', 'Heating/cooling:', 'Air conditioning', 'Wiring:', 'Facilities and Recreation:', 'Shared pool, Fitness center, Clubhouse, Barbecue, Business center, Tennis court', 'Security and Access:', 'Gated entry', 'Views:', 'Water', 'Additional features:', 'Fireplace, Vaulted ceiling, Skylights, Non-Smoking Property', 'Offered by:', 'Water Terrace', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
